title: Don't get sucked into the hype
review: I created this account just to leave this review. It's not the films directors fault that this has been GROSSLY overrated by all the luvvies. It's a decent drama on the subject of loss, that's all I can say about the film. As a horror? The Exorcist of our generation? Not a chance. If you're coming into this like I did ready to get your horror socks blown off then don't worry, your feet will remained untouched. I get what kind of horror it was trying to be and like I say as a solid drama on loss it's not bad but do not expect to be scared. Infact it all becomes rather stupid towards the end.
